subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwight Howard, the subject of rampant trade speculation, had only 8 points against the Knicks. Ryan Anderson, a solid contributor all season, picked up the slack by scoring 30.
snippet: Dwight Howard, the subject of rampant trade speculation, had only 8 points against the Knicks. Ryan Anderson, a solid contributor all season, picked up the slack by scoring 30.
